articles.content: It may have felt like its taken forever for last weeks game against the Carolina Panthers to be finally put in the rearview mirror, but you might just be shaking off a Christmas hangover yourself. In… [+9595 chars]

articles.author: David Hookstead
articles.title: Texas Tech Honors Mike Leach On 1st Play Of Bowl Game - OutKick
articles.description: Texas Tech honored Mike Leach in awesome fashion in the Texas Bowl against Ole Miss. Watch a video of the tribute play.
articles.content:
Texas Tech honored Mike Leach in awesome fashion Wednesday night.

articles.author: Andrew Lopez
articles.title: Pelicans' Zion Williamson takes over, has team's final 14 in win - ESPN
articles.description: Zion Williamson scored 33 of his career-best 43 points in the second half, including the Pelicans' last 14 points, as New Orleans held on for a 119-118 win over Minnesota.
articles.content:
With time ticking away in the fourth quarter and the New Orleans Pelicans trailing the Minnesota Timberwolves, CJ McCollum joked that the Pelicans' game plan became quite simple.
